department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Procurement of thirty (30) Android Scanners and accessories.
description: The solicitation is for the purchase of thirty (30) Android Scanners and accessories to be delivered in Ottawa, Ontario. This is a procurement of goods for the Library and Archives Canada (LAC).
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### RFP for Android Scanners for Library and Archives Canada
[HTML link to the online tender announcement]

**Solicitation Details**

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3617150079
* **Date of Publication**: February 28, 2023
* **Amended on**: March 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 20, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 2, 2022 (Note: Previous sollicitation had a start date on this same day)

**Tender Description**
The procurement seeks thirty (30) Android Scanners and related accessories for delivery to Library and Archives Canada in Ottawa, Ontario. Bidders are required to submit their proposals and supporting documentation in accordance with the solicitation requirements.

**Key Procurement Details**

* **Buying Organization**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Library and Archives of Canada (LAC)
* **Schedule of Requirements**: Thirty (30) Android Scanners and related accessories
* **Deliver to**: Ottawa, Ontario
* **Solicitation Notice**: This solicitation supersedes the previously published tender on October 28, 2022 with a closing of December 23, 2022.
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive – Open Bidding

**Notice**
Bidders are advised to disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadlines and Buyandsell posting closing times. All proposed submissions must be submitted by the tender closing date of March 20, 2023 at 14:00 EST. Submissions received after the closing date and time will be declared non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements**
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Responding to this Tender
Technical specifications and claiming instructions are available online via the above-mentioned link. Respondents must submit their proposals electronically in accordance with the solicitation requirements.

For further information or clarification on the tender, please contact Veronica Vallejo by email **veronica.vallejo@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**. I hope this submission meets the requirements. Please feel free to ask if there is anything else.  Thank you for your help. Will be looking forward.
